field.name: sName
field.desc: The name of the weapon. This is a unique identifier

field.name: sIconName
field.desc: Icon name - UI

field.name: locidDisplayName
field.desc: Localized 'Human' name of the weapon

field.name: sUniquePickupName
field.desc: Unique name used to prevent picking up of any other weapons with the same name as one you already carry.

field.name: fReloadTimeNormal
field.desc: Time of the reloading process, playing animation is scaled on defined time when m_reloadTime is not equal to 0

field.name: fReloadTimeForced
field.desc: Time when forced to reload because ammo is empty, playing animation is scaled on defined time when m_reloadTime is not equal to 0

field.name: fReloadTimeSingleBegin
field.desc: Time to start reload cycle on shotgun-type weapons, playing animation is scaled on defined time when m_reloadTime is not equal to 0

field.name: fReloadTimeSingleEnd
field.desc: Time to end reload cycle on shotgun-type weapons, playing animation is scaled on defined time when m_reloadTime is not equal to 0

field.name: fReloadTimeForcedSingleBegin
field.desc: Time to start forced reload cycle on shotgun-type weapons, playing animation is scaled on defined time when m_reloadTime is not equal to 0

field.name: fReloadTimeIronsight
field.desc: Time of the reloading process while in ironsight used only when non-zero.

field.name: fDofBlendRate
field.desc: The rate of blend from one dof to another.

field.name: fDofMaxMoveSpeed
field.desc: The max speed the player moves at to get the max moving dof values.

field.name: bPlayAllAnimLayersInReload
field.desc: Play all anim layers in ironsight during prepare and reload.

field.name: fSprintToFireTime
field.desc: Time (if non zero) to go from sprint to shoot anim.

field.name: fSprintToIronSightTime
field.desc: Time (if non zero) to go from sprint to ironsight transition anim.

field.name: fDrawTime
field.desc: Time of the weapon drawing process, playing animation is scaled on defined time when m_drawTime is not equal to 0

field.name: fHolsterTime
field.desc: Time of the holstering process, playing animation is scaled on defined time when m_holsterTime is not equal to 0

field.name: fThrowableHolsterTime
field.desc: Time of the holstering when throwing something (grenade, rock..), playing animation is scaled on defined time when m_throwableHolsterTime is not equal to 0

field.name: fHolsterTakedownAboveTime
field.desc: Time of the holstering process when about to do the above takedown manoeuvre.

field.name: fSwitchToMacheteTime
field.desc: Time to holster weapon and draw machete, playing animation is scaled on defined time when m_drawTime is not equal to 0

field.name: bAutoReload
field.desc: Boolean variable which indicates if weapon should automatically reload if current clip is empty

field.name: bAutoReloadInIronsight
field.desc: If auto reload is enabled then this determines if you can perform it in ironsight.

field.name: bIsSilent
field.desc: Indicating that target will be killed silently or with silent weapon

field.name: bVisibleHolstered
field.desc: Visible or not in first person view

field.name: bEmitLight
field.desc: Identifies if the shot fired emitted a flash

field.name: fFireTriggerPressThreshold
field.desc: Amount required to press the trigger to fire the weapon.

field.name: fNearFovDegrees
field.desc: Near FOV for weapon in degrees.

field.name: fNearFovDegreesSplitscreen
field.desc: Near FOV override for weapon in degrees, 0 means use same as Near FOV.

field.name: bIsScopeAttached
field.desc: Is this weapon a scoped weapon (without requiring attachments)

field.name: fBusyDuration
field.desc: 'Busy' time in between shots, a weapon cannot fire until the busy time has expired. Busy time starts when the weapon is activated

field.name: iFireRate
field.desc: Frequency at which a specific weapon can fire or launch its projectiles in rounds per minute

field.name: bControlsSpeedOfShootAnims
field.desc: Code controls the speed of the shoot anims.

field.name: fPrepareShotTime
field.desc: Duration of shot prepare (bolt action) animation.

field.name: iMeleeSwingRate
field.desc: Frequency at which a specific weapon can be swung for melee attacks in swings per minute.

field.name: ammoAmmoType
field.desc: Unique id of the ammo type. To add an ammo type, edit the file in /data/editor/WeaponsTemplates.xml

field.name: iAmmoInClip
field.desc: How many bullets does the clip contain. Every time the player hits Reload, the clip will be reset to this amount, if there are enough bullets left

field.name: bUsesClips
field.desc: If the weapon doesn't use clips, always fetch the bullets from the pouch

field.name: bIsAmmoVisible
field.desc: Visible or not in first person view

field.name: fAmmoRemainingRatioForReloadPrompt
field.desc: Ammo ratio threshold before reload prompt is displayed.

field.name: fRecoilRecoveryTime
field.desc: The speed at which the weapon recovers from recoil

field.name: fRecoilAchieveTime
field.desc: Time to achieve the recoil

field.name: fRecoilAnimationWeight
field.desc: Value for the eMValueID_WEAPONRECOILANIMWEIGHT move state in animation component

field.name: fRecoilMaxPitch
field.desc: Max pitch of recoil. Used to calculate deflection based on recoil m_recoilAchieveTime

field.name: fRecoilMaxYaw
field.desc: Max degrees the gun can recoil horizontally from the camera.

field.name: fRecoilWeaponOffsetYawBlend
field.desc: Percent amount (0-1) the weapon offsets will include the horizontal recoil. Can be < 0 or > 1

field.name: fRecoilWeaponOffsetPitchBlend
field.desc: Percent amount (0-1) the weapon offsets will include the vertical recoil. Can be < 0 or > 1

field.name: arkRollCurve
field.desc: The curve that the roll value will map onto. X is Scaled by roll duration. Y is scaled by the roll applied. X is cut off after 1 on initial unscaled curve.

field.name: arkAchieveCurve
field.desc: The curve (x from 0 to 1) that controls the amount of recoil over the achieve time.

field.name: arkRecoveryCurve
field.desc: The curve( x from 0 to 1) that controls the amount of recoil over the recovery time.

field.name: fMaxYOffset
field.desc: Max amount of Y the gun can translate back by.

field.name: fYOffsetPerShot
field.desc: Amount of y moved back on the weapon per shot.

field.name: fIronsightMaxYOffset
field.desc: Max amount of Y the gun can translate back by.

field.name: fIronsightYOffsetPerShot
field.desc: Amount of y moved back on the weapon per shot.

field.name: fRecoilYOffsetRecoveryTime
field.desc: The speed at which the weapon recovers from recoil

field.name: arkYOffsetRecoveryCurve
field.desc: The curve( x from 0 to 1) that controls the amount of recoil over the recovery time.

field.name: fIKRecoilBurstSpeedIn
field.desc: Used for RecoilWeight calculation only when WeaponFireStrategy is being used, affects the 3rd person characters

field.name: fIKRecoilBurstPitchRandom
field.desc: If not equal zero, used as a coefficient for random generator

field.name: fIKRecoilBurstSpeedOut
field.desc: for RecoilWeight calculation only when WeaponFireStrategy is not being used

field.name: fIKRecoilBurstPitchRate
field.desc: Used for actual pitch recoil rotation calculation. Depends on fDeltaTime and RecoilPitchRotDest

field.name: vIKRecoilBurstOffset
field.desc: Param for the rotate vector calculation by formula: vDir = RotateVector(- RecoilBurstOffset * RecoilWeight)

field.name: fSway_data_blendTime
field.desc: Blend time from one set of sway values to another.

field.name: bIsCameraBoneUsedFromSway
field.desc: Camera sways together with reticule. Sniper behavior. Note: Weapon animation should use camera bone for this effect

field.name: bCanHoldBreath
field.desc: Can the player use the hold breath ability while this weapon is equipped?

field.name: fSwayReductionModifier
field.desc: Modifier to sway when user has unlocked the sway reduction ability

field.name: fWeaponSwayCoverMultiplier
field.desc: The multiplier by which all other sway multipliers are multiplied when the player is in cover

field.name: bUseAngularSpeedSwayReduction
field.desc: If set then uses the maxAngularSpeedForSwayReduction values to reduce sway when you rotate the camera aim.

object.name: Sway_default
object.desc: Camera sways together with reticule. Sniper behavior. Note: Weapon animation should use camera bone for this effect

field.name: fSwayCurveBlendRate
field.desc: Rate at which we blend when going between the sway curves and the sway moving curves. Increase to speed up.

field.name: bIsRightHanded
field.desc: Are the bones used calculated from the right hand or the left hand? This also applies to the procedural sway.

field.name: fBlendRate
field.desc: Rate of change from one set of offset data to another.

field.name: arkWeaponOffsetBlendingCurve
field.desc: A curve that takes the difference in speed values for each axis of input movement (0-1) and generates a multiplier on the blend rate.

field.name: fStrafeBlendRate
field.desc: Rate of change between amounts of strafe-ing.

field.name: fPitchBlendRate
field.desc: Rate of change between amounts of pitch offset.

field.name: fYawBlendRate
field.desc: Rate of change between amounts of yaw offset.

field.name: fYawSpeedLimit
field.desc: Maximum degree per second of turn speed accounted for by offsets.

field.name: fPitchSpeedLimit
field.desc: Maximum degree per second of pitchturn speed accounted for by offsets.

field.name: fMouseTurnBlendRateMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplier on turn speed blend rates when using the mouse.

field.name: fMouseTurnBlendRateIronsightMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplier on turn speed blend rates when using the mouse.

field.name: fMouseYawMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplier on the yaw inputs used for the weapon offset while using the mouse.

field.name: fMousePitchMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplier on the pitch inputs used for the weapon offset while using the mouse.

field.name: fReticleScalarHoriz
field.desc: Multiplies degrees of the offset of the reticle from front facing to give the value passed in to the weapon offset.

field.name: fReticleScalarVert
field.desc: Multiplies degrees of the offset of the reticle from front facing to give the value passed in to the weapon offset.

field.name: bHorizOffsetsMirrorY
field.desc: If ticked then the output will always be the same size of zero whether the input is +ive or -ive.

field.name: bHorizOffsetsMirrorZ
field.desc: If ticked then the output will always be the same size of zero whether the input is +ive or -ive.

field.name: bVertOffsetsMirrorY
field.desc: If ticked then the output will always be the same size of zero whether the input is +ive or -ive.

field.name: bVertOffsetsMirrorZ
field.desc: If ticked then the output will always be the same size of zero whether the input is +ive or -ive.

field.name: bStrafeOffsetsMirrorY
field.desc: If ticked then the output will always be the same size of zero whether the input is +ive or -ive.

field.name: bStrafeOffsetsMirrorZ
field.desc: If ticked then the output will always be the same size of zero whether the input is +ive or -ive.

object.name: freeReticle
object.desc: Exotic gameplay used in Chopper Sequence for E3,... and maybe others in a near future.

field.name: fCover_PeekOut_Transition_Time
field.desc: Time it takes To go from Behind Cover to Out of Cover.

field.name: fAfterShotOutOfCoverTime
field.desc: Amount of time player will stay out of cover after a he shot.

field.name: bUsableInSinglePlayer
field.desc: Can we use this weapon on ziplines in Single Player?

field.name: bUsableInMultiPlayer
field.desc: Can we use this weapon on ziplines in Multi Player?

field.name: bMeleeInterruptsSprint
field.desc: Melee interrupts sprinting.

field.name: bMeleeUsingWeapon
field.desc: Whether weapon can or not perform melee attack

field.name: bStealthTakedownUsingWeapon
field.desc: Whether weapon can perform stealth takedown attack

field.name: bMeleeUsingMachete
field.desc: Use machete to perform melee attack

field.name: bCanUseWhenRunning
field.desc: Wether this weapon can be used or not when running

field.name: iMaxNumAttachments
field.desc: MAximum number of weapon attachments on this weapon.

object.name: ModelsForLoad
object.desc: list of weapons attachments to mount

field.name: sSkinNamePrefix
field.desc: A name that is added to the start of skin names to make them unique. The full name, eg <PREFIX>GOLD is how it will be referenced in the db, so if prefix is 'AK_' then the db will know it as 'AK_GOLD'.

object.name: UnlockableSkins
object.desc: list of skin names (without the prefex, as they are listed in the GraphicComponent of the weapon) which can be unlocked/purchased/upgraded.

field.name: bCanFlickFire
field.desc: Specifies whether Flick Fire is possible for this weapon.

field.name: bCanQuickFire
field.desc: Specifies whether you can double tap with this weapon.

field.name: fNearFovDegrees
field.desc: Near FOV for weapon in degrees when in marksman mode.

field.name: fFovDegrees
field.desc: Main FOV for weapon in degrees when in marksman mode.

field.name: ScopeCenterBone
field.desc: Bone on the weapon or the scope attachement to look through when aiming in ironsights.

field.name: fMoveSpeedFactor
field.desc: The move sensitivity factor to apply from the weapon in ironsight

field.name: bCanIronsight
field.desc: Identifies whether the pawn can go in iron sight mode using this weapon

field.name: fLookSensitivityFactor
field.desc: look sensitivity factor to apply from the weapon in ironsight

field.name: fLookSensitivityFactorMouse
field.desc: look sensitivity factor to apply from the weapon in ironsight for mouse control

field.name: fVerticalLookSensitivityFactor
field.desc: vertical look sensitivity factor to apply from the weapon in ironsight

field.name: fCoverMoveSpeedMultiplierIronSight
field.desc: The move sensitivity multiplier for the weapon when in cover in ironsight

field.name: fCoverLookSpeedMultiplierIronSight
field.desc: The look sensitivity multiplier for the weapon while in cover in ironsight

field.name: fIronsightFOVDegrees
field.desc: Field of View for ironsight (in degrees)

field.name: fIronsightNearFOVDegrees
field.desc: Field of View for ironsight in near Z (in degrees)

field.name: fIronsightTransitionTime
field.desc: The time the ironsight transition must take

field.name: fIronsightTransitionTimeFromSprint
field.desc: The time the ironsight transition must take from sprinting

field.name: fSnapAimCylinderFactor
field.desc: Factor applied to scale the radius over distance

field.name: fIronsightRecoilFactor
field.desc: A multiplier to be applied to the weapon's recoil when in ironsight

field.name: fIronsightPrepareDelay
field.desc: The delay for preparing the gun when using ironsights

field.name: bIronsightCanPrepare
field.desc: Triggers a different set of anims/behavior when the weapon needs to prepare while in ironsight. Otherwise the weapon goes out of ironsight first.

field.name: bStayInIronsightWhenPrepare
field.desc: If the weapon can be prepared in iron sight and this is true, will force the weapon to stay in ironsight.

field.name: bAlwaysIronsightReload
field.desc: Always stay in ironsight when reloading.

field.name: arkTransitionCurve
field.desc: The name of the curve for ironsight transition

field.name: arkAnimPlaybackCurve
field.desc: The name of the curve ironshight animation playback

field.name: bCanShootDuringIronsightTransition
field.desc: Allow firing during ironsight transition. ***WARNING*** Animation move states need to be set up specially for this to work.

field.name: bCanIronsightTransitionWhileShooting
field.desc: Allow transitioning between ironsight while shooting.

field.name: bCanShootDuringIronsightTransitionInCover
field.desc: Allow firing during ironsight transition while Player is in Cover. ***WARNING*** Animation move states need to be set up specially for this to work.

field.name: bCanIronsightTransitionWhileShootingInCover
field.desc: Allow transitioning between ironsight while shooting while player is in cover.

field.name: bIronsightAimingHelperEnabled
field.desc: Aiming helper enabled for this weapon.

field.name: fAimingHelperInacurracyDistance
field.desc: The range at which aiming is at the maximum variation and least precise.

field.name: fAimingHelperMinDistance
field.desc: The minimum distance for snap-aim to be applied at the minimum value.

field.name: fAimingHelperMaxDistance
field.desc: The distance at which snap-aim is applied to the maximum.

field.name: fAimingHelperFadeOutStartDistance
field.desc: The distance at which snap aim starts fading out.

field.name: fAimingHelperFadeOutStopDistance
field.desc: The distance at which snap-aim stops entirely.

field.name: fAimingHelperLockOnSpeed
field.desc: Speed at which weapon will lock on target.

field.name: bCanFlickFire
field.desc: Specifies whether Flick Fire is possible for this weapon.

field.name: bCanQuickFire
field.desc: Specifies whether you can double tap with this weapon.

field.name: drivingAndShootingFOVDegrees
field.desc: The FOV when driving and shooting with this weapon.

field.name: crosshairMagmaAreaName
field.desc: The name of the Magma area that represents the crosshair for this weapon

field.name: fRange
field.desc: Any projectile that goes beyond that range it simply forgotten (in meters)

field.name: vectorEffectiveRange
field.desc: for weapon. Params multiplied on basic range. 0.15 and 0.20 by default. Influences aiming helpers for feedback about the weaponn++s effectiveness

field.name: vectorEffectiveRangeIS
field.desc: Effective range for Iron Sight. Params multiplied on basic range. 0.20 and 0.25 by default. Influences aiming helpers for feedback about the weaponn++s effectiveness

field.name: fMinReticleTargettingRange
field.desc: Min Range enemies must be from player for reticle to go red.

field.name: fMaxReticleTargettingRange
field.desc: Max Range enemies must be from player for reticle to go red.

field.name: fTagRange
field.desc: the max distance to tag ennemies in iron sight.

field.name: fTagTime
field.desc: the time needed to tag ennemies in iron sight.

field.name: fUnjamTime
field.desc: The time it takes to unjam

field.name: iClipsForSelfDestruct
field.desc: Part of the weapon degradation system. Used computing self damage per shot method

field.name: bIsIndestructible
field.desc: Weapon cannot jam and have it's reliability go down

field.name: bIsBreakable
field.desc: Weapon can jam and have it's reliability go down but cannot break

field.name: fLookSensitivityFactor
field.desc: The look sensitivity factor to apply from the weapon

field.name: fMouseLookSensitivityMultiplier
field.desc: Extra look sensitivity applied when using a mouse.

field.name: fMoveSpeedFactor
field.desc: The move sensitivity factor to apply from the weapon

field.name: fMoveSpeedFactorShooting
field.desc: The move sensitivity factor to apply from the weapon when shooting

field.name: fCoverMoveSpeedMultiplier
field.desc: The move sensitivity multiplier for the weapon when in cover

field.name: fCoverLookSpeedMultiplier
field.desc: The look sensitivity multiplier for the weapon while in cover

field.name: fForcedReliability
field.desc: Broken weapons can't be unjammed. If reliability less then zero, weapon is broken

field.name: fInitialJamCounter
field.desc: Used to initialize Weapon Jam Counter. If JamCounter > 0, weapon is jammed

field.name: iJamBulletThreshold
field.desc: After which bullet a jam can occur in the clip. Ex: threshold = 10, a jam will possibly occur after bullet 10

field.name: iDudBulletThreshold
field.desc: Before which bullet a dud will occur in the clip if there is a jam bullet present. Ex: threshold = 10, a dud bullet will occur before bullet 10

field.name: iSafeClipsAfterUnjam
field.desc: Number of clips that will never jam after clearing or unjamming the weapon

field.name: arkPickupArchetype
field.desc: The name of the pickup archetype, creates this entity when the weapon is dropped

field.name: fShootingAngle
field.desc: Shooting angle in normal mode. The game adds this value to the gun wielded in 3rd person. This is a patch when anims don't point perfectly in the right direction in 3rd; setting this angle can correct the situation.

field.name: fShootingIronsightAngle
field.desc: Shooting angle in Iron Sight mode. The game adds this value to the gun wielded in 3rd person. This is a patch when anims don't point perfectly in the right direction in 3rd; setting this angle can correct the situation.

field.name: HolsterHandle
field.desc: Holster Handle String ID

field.name: RightHandHandle
field.desc: Equip Handle String ID

field.name: fRumbleMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplier for pad vibration when shooting.

field.name: fRumbleMultiplierIronsight
field.desc: Multiplier for pad vibration when shooting in ironsight.

field.name: bUseWeaponFollowVars
field.desc: if the follow helper values should be taken from this weapon or the player

field.name: fMinDistForInfluence
field.desc: Minimum distance to enemy for influence to be applied.

field.name: fMinDistForMaxInfluence
field.desc: Minimum distance to enemy for max influence to be applied.

field.name: fMaxDistForMaxInfluence
field.desc: Maximum distance to enemy for max influence to be applied.

field.name: fMaxDistForInfluence
field.desc: Maximum distance to enemy for min influence to be applied.

field.name: fMinDistForInfluence
field.desc: Minimum distance to enemy for influence to be applied.

field.name: fMinDistForMaxInfluence
field.desc: Minimum distance to enemy for max influence to be applied.

field.name: fMaxDistForMaxInfluence
field.desc: Maximum distance to enemy for max influence to be applied.

field.name: fMaxDistForInfluence
field.desc: Maximum distance to enemy for min influence to be applied.

field.name: fMaxDistForRightStickAssist
field.desc: Max dist to enemy for right stick assist.

field.name: muzzleFlashColor
field.desc: Color of the muzzle flash.

field.name: fMuzzleFlashIntensity
field.desc: Intensity of the muzzle flash.

field.name: GraphicKitHolsterTag
field.desc: Graphic Kit part tag for holster

field.name: MeshToHide
field.desc: Name of mesh (if any) to hide for this weapon.

field.name: bIsMountedWeapon
field.desc: Is this a mounted weapon?
